about_the_game:
The Kemopop! Steam demo includes a selection of eight of many more stages; four Special Guest, four Campaign.

If you like what you see, continue playing the full version from your demo save!!

content_descriptors.notes:
Kemopop! is an eroge about male kemono ("beast") characters working in various food-related jobs. Progressing in the game will make them undress.

Expect boys, and more boys. Some characters have extra sequences exploring other poses and fetishes, namely hyper...!

Kemopop! is an adult-only title. All characters are over 18.

detailed_description:
The Kemopop! Steam demo includes a selection of eight of many more stages; four Special Guest, four Campaign.

If you like what you see, continue playing the full version from your demo save!!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Kernel 6.0 or newer
  • Processor: 64-bit x86
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Chipset
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Optional

name: Kemopop! Demo

short_description: Undress your femboy waiter in this original physics puzzler! An extended demo featuring eight stages!!! A kemono game, by kemono artists.
supported_languages: English, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
